CONTENT.SUBTITLE: It's not just a T-shirt
CONTENT.TITLE: It's a Manifesto to be Worn!
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Compound is a statement to wear, it's ink; it's an act of verbal responsibility; it's the indelible polysemy of the character we have imprinted and carry with us.

FEATURED.TITLE: Featured Products
FEATURED.DESCRIPTION: Check out our top picks for you!

COMPANY.FACT_1_DESCRIPTION: Made by hand in Italy. Any imperfections are not considered defects, but proof of artisanal craftsmanship.
COMPANY.FACT_2_DESCRIPTION: Made with organic and natural materials. The small amount of plastic you will find in me is recycled and processed sustainably.
COMPANY.FACT_3_DESCRIPTION: Made to last a long time, to become your second skin. I use only the highest quality materials. Take care of me.
COMPANY.PHILOSOPHY_DESCRIPTION: We create garments that speak about you. Each piece is an ethical and sustainable manifesto, designed to celebrate language, respect the planet, and endure over time. Because dressing is expressing who you are, without compromises.

FOOTER.COMPANY_INFO: Compound Ltd. | VAT: 123456789 | Address: 123 E-commerce St., Milan, Italy

TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS.INTRODUCTION: Welcome to our website. By accessing or using our site, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

USE_OF_SITE.TITLE: Use of the Website
USE_OF_SITE.PARAGRAPH: You agree to use this site responsibly and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY.TITLE: Intellectual Property
INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY.PARAGRAPH: All content on this site, including text, images, and logos, is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.

LIMITATION_OF_LIABILITY.TITLE: Limitation of Liability
LIMITATION_OF_LIABILITY.PARAGRAPH: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our site.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: Modifications to Terms
MODIFICATIONS.PARAGRAPH: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Please check this page regularly.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.PARAGRAPH: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at support@example.com.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRODUCTION: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: Data Collection
DATA_COLLECTION.PARAGRAPH: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide, such as name, email, and address.

DATA_USAGE.TITLE: Data Usage
DATA_USAGE.PARAGRAPH: We use your personal data to provide our services, improve user experience, and communicate with you.

USER_RIGHTS.TITLE: User Rights
USER_RIGHTS.PARAGRAPH: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us for more information.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.PARAGRAPH: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us at support@example.com.

WITHDRAWAL.TITLE: Withdrawal Policy
WITHDRAWAL.INTRODUCTION: You have the right to withdraw from the purchase contract within 14 days without providing any reason.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Withdrawal Conditions
CONDITIONS.PARAGRAPH: The product must be returned intact and in its original packaging. Shipping costs are the responsibility of the buyer.

PROCEDURE.TITLE: Withdrawal Procedure
PROCEDURE.PARAGRAPH: To exercise your right of withdrawal, please contact us via email or use the withdrawal form available on the website.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.PARAGRAPH: If you have any questions about our withdrawal policy, please contact us at support@example.com.
